titles: The coppy of a letter written by a friend, to the Laird of Blaikwood and his answer, with the coppy of my Lord Angus's letter, from Utrecht, 21/11 January 1692. To My Lord Marquess of Dowglas his father, Edinburgh, 16th: August 1692.
author: Lawrie, William, d. 1700?
Angus, James Douglas, Earl of, 1671-1692.
Marketing/Technology Service.
notes: Letters are signed: M. T: S:, Will: Lawrie, and Angus [i.e. James Douglas].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Angus, James Douglas, --  Earl of, 1671-1692 --  Early works to 1800.
